actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources

official_title: A bill to waive the required Congressional review period for a natural gas pipeline to be built by Tennessee Gas Pipeline Company across certain Army Corps of Engineers land in Massachusetts.

summary.text: Waives the congressional review period required by the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 for a certain underground natural gas pipeline to be constructed by the Tennessee Gas Pipeline Company across specified Army Corps of Engineers lands in Massachusetts.

titles.title: A bill to waive the required Congressional review period for a natural gas pipeline to be built by Tennessee Gas Pipeline Company across certain Army Corps of Engineers land in Massachusetts.
